oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Steve Evans interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Minser, Billy
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Col. Stephen C. Evans served in the U. S. Army, Artillery as a forward observer with First Field Force Vietnam for six months and was reassigned to The Military Assistance Command Vietnam, (MAC-V), for the last six months. He served from July 1968 to July 1969. He retired from the Army Reserve 31 July 1997 after 30 years of service. He was interviewed August 3, 2020, at the Oak Ridge Community Center by Billy Minser. This chapter is based on that interview. Audio interview: http://bit.ly/vv-steveevans
